title: Zombie Slayer
description: Julia Maraton has just woken to a living nightmare. The streets of Seattle are crawling with the walking dead. Joining a rag-tag group of survivors, the plan is to head North to Alaska.But escaping Seattle was only the beginning. Now they must deal with desperate survivors, boatloads of zombies, a murderer. Joining forces with a boat of surviving Navy Seals and the few survivors picked up along the way they make their way to the fortified shelter of Julia's home.Gambling the fate of humanity as well as her heart, Julia risks everything to ensure there is a future for the human race, ultimately making a decision that will effect us all. Julia Maraton is the Zombie Slayer.
author: Darlene Reilley
